title: LFT Master/Challenger team for scrims tomorrow at 5:30pm Aest
body: Hi I am currently looking for a team from Master or Challenger to scrim my applicants tomorrow for my team for a few games. Pleas add me in game if you are interested or you can reply on here. Would love to get a or a couple of teams to scrim against so I can gather data on the players. High diamond teams will be acceptable as well.
